data.comment: Today's referee, Antony Gautier, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, In Fontvieille, Cesc Fabregas of Monaco is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 3, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Gelson Martins (Monaco) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kevin Denkey (Nimes) has received a yellow card from Antony Gautier.
In the minute 6, Antony Gautier awards Nimes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 12, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Monaco.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
In the minute 14, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Cesc Fabregas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monaco.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Goal! Monaco have got their heads in front thanks to a Sofiane Diop strike.
Antony Gautier signals a Nimes throw-in in Monaco's half.
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 23, Free kick Nimes.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Louis II.
Monaco's Sofiane Diop gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nimes defender.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Louis II.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 29, Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Nimes have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Nimes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 34, Monaco's Gelson Martins gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 35, Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Free kick in a good position for Monaco!
In the minute 38, Monaco are pushing forward but Youssouf Fofana's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Monaco needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
In the minute 42, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Nimes.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Play has been interrupted briefly in Fontvieille to check on Kevin Denkey, who is grimacing with pain.
Antony Gautier awards Nimes a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has ended.
Haris Duljevic is replacing Kevin Denkey for Nimes at Stade Louis II.
The second half has started at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Lamine Fomba with Niclas Eliasson. This is the second substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nimes.
Can Nimes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Monaco.
Lucas Deaux of Nimes gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 49, Monaco have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 52, Nimes's Haris Duljevic gets in a shot on goal at Stade Louis II. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Antony Gautier signals a Monaco throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Louis II.
Monaco are coming forward and Kevin Volland gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 58, Nimes have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Nimes's Lucas Deaux goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in Monaco.
In the minute 60, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Wissam Ben Yedder is replacing Cesc Fabregas for the home team.
In the minute 62, Nimes's Haris Duljevic misses with an attempt on goal.
Antony Gautier awards Monaco a goal kick.
Wissam Ben Yedder (Monaco) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Louis II.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Free kick Nimes.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
In the minute 66, Zinedine Ferhat (Nimes) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Monaco have a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Lucas Deaux (Nimes) is red-carded and dismissed.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 72, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 75, Goal! Monaco extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a Gelson Martins header.
That's a fine assist from Ruben Aguilar.
Goal! Monaco extend their lead to 3-0 through Kevin Volland.
In the minute 77, Great play from Wissam Ben Yedder to set up the goal.
Wissam Ben Yedder for Monaco gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 79, In Fontvieille Monaco attack through Wissam Ben Yedder. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
The home team replace Gelson Martins with Fode Toure.
In the minute 80, Jerome Arpinon (Nimes) is making a third substitution, with Florian Miguel replacing Pablo Martinez.
Pietro Pellegri is on a sub for Kevin Volland for Monaco.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Youssouf Fofana for Monaco has been booked by Antony Gautier and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Renaud Ripart.
Niko Kovac is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Louis II with Stevan Jovetic replacing Sofiane Diop.
In the minute 84, Renaud Ripart is back on the pitch.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monaco make their fifth substitution with Eliot Matazo replacing Youssouf Fofana.
Monaco push forward at Stade Louis II and Pietro Pellegri gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Nimes defence.
In the minute 85, Important block from the Nimes defence as Eliot Matazo fires in a strike for Monaco.
Monaco drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
At Stade Louis II, Monaco are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Antony Gautier signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Nimes's area.
Antony Gautier awards Nimes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Monaco.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
